line.en: 'I'm coming in, Isuka.'
'Amane...what's going on?'
'I came to see how you feel. This is from\nTatsuya.'
'Thanks... oh, jelly! Looks yummy.'
'Quack quack.'
'Hm? Hat? You grew up.'
'Quack.'
'You were just a baby until quite recently.'
'It eats a lot.'
'...How are you feeling?'
'I'm fine. I just have a little fever.'
'Okay.'
'You didn't have to come.'
'But you have taken three days off now. You might\nhave the flu.'
'No. It's not like that.'
'...This always happens to me.'
'But I haven't had a bad one since I became\nfriends with you. I'd been feeling good lately.'
'I probably got carried away away... he he he'
'Did I make you do that?'
'No! Just the opposite. You made me feel alive.'
'Are you sure?'
'...I've never told you?'
'...I haven't been in good health since I was\nborn.'
'You don't look that way.'
'Usually.'
'But if I'm in high spirits... even on an\nordinary day...'
'I'll get a high fever and have to stay in bed.'
'I get very scared... on those nights that'
'...That I may not be able to wake up ever\nagain.'
'I feel light-headed and I have difficulty\nbreathing...I might die like this.'
'Isuka...'
'...Amane, hold my hand.'
'Okay.'
*squeezes hand*
'...On that night, I want somebody to hold my\nhands. Otherwise, I get very worried.'
'I'm always here for you. I can stay here\ntonight.'
'Hee hee. I'll be ok. I feel much better now. I\ncan probably go to school tomorrow.'
'I don't have time to be sick.'
'Alright...'
'I don't think I can live as long as other\npeople.'
'So I want to leave something... some proof that\nI lived.'
'Yeah, you should. If there's anything I can do,\ntell me.'
'...What happened to that?'
'Ah, do you mean college?'
'I turned it down.'
'What? Why?'
'I have nothing to learn in college.'
'...But you can choose any school you want.'
'...I'm sort of interested, but I have somewhere\nI want to go.'
'Huh?'
'You are taking me there, right? To the sky?'
'Amane, you are...'
'A promise between us is more important to me.'
'Hm? Why are you surprised?'
'...I mean it's just like you to understand me so\nwell.'
'Don't worry. I'd risk my life to take you to the\nsky.'
'Yeah, I look forward to it.'
'He he he... Promise.'
Isuka is always bright and lively. But on that\nday, she looked a little small.
It had me worried.
She looked like a different person from the Isuka\nI know.
'By the way, do you know where my glasses are? I\nlost them when I fell asleep in the room.'
'I don't know. You always lose things.'
'Aww... I can't see well without my glasses.'
'You should change to contact lenses.'
'...I guess I'll have to.'
'Is that all you need?'
'Yeah, it's just two days.'
Kotori said it holding her bag on her lap.
'Good morning.'
'Good morning.'
The Kazato sisters came down the stairs.
They're both holding bags.
'Everybody's going casual, huh.'
'It doesn't take that long to get to my place by\nbus and train.'
'We have clothes at home.'
It was few days after the first flight with the\nimproved plane.
We didn't have much trouble and the test went\nwell. So we deciced to take a few days off from\nthe club.
We've been working very hard since before summer\nbreak, so this is a little vacation for us.
To tell the truth, we should have more test\nflights.
But we're having a training camp for the Morning\nGlory at the end of the summer break. This is the\nonly time to rest.
The Obon holiday is over, but Kotori decided to\ngo home.
And Asa and Yoru are going back home for a while.
'You said you weren't going back. What made you\nchange your mind?'
'Because Hibari seems very sad.'
She argued with Hibari about going home.
They get along together well, but this time they\ndidn't give up.
'...And I made my parents worry a lot.'
Kotori made them worry when she shut herself in\nthe garage last year.
I don't know much about it, but Kotori had some\ntrouble with her parents before too.
After that happened, they got together and\ntalked.
As often happens, their relationship now seems to\nbe better than it was before.
It also got her to go home.
'Relax and have a good time.'
'I will.'
'Asa, Yoru, don't forget that.'
'About I-s-u-k-a.'
'I'll ask my grandpa.'
They accepted.
We just found out yesterday. They know Isuka\nMisagi.
They've met her for some reason.
Amane came down the stairs.
'Hey, are you going home now?'
'Yes. You can call me anytime if you get lonely.'
'Hm? You are coming back in a few days, aren't\nyou?'
She said it so matter-of-factly that Kotori got a\nlittle angry.
'Call me anyway! Just five minutes or something!'
'(Please call her. She'll be lonely if you\ndon't.)'
'Alrighty.'
I heard the car beep.
'Oh, that must be Hibari!'
'Hibari!'
'Kotori!'
Hibari runs toward Kotori like she hasn't seen\nher in forever.
It has only been a week.
'...I'm glad you changed your mind to come home.\nMom and Dad will be happy.'
'I mean, they are already happy. Obon is over but\nthey are taking days off.'
'It's nothing.'
'I'll be home for only two days. If you try to\nkeep me there, I'll come back here as soon as\npossible.'
'Okay. I got it.'
Is it that big of a deal?
'Good morning, Hibari.'
'Thank you for today.'
Hibari is going to take Asa and Yoru to the\nstation in her car.
'No problem. Kotori has such cute friends.'
They look very cute to Hibari because they are\nyounger than her. However, they are cute no\nmatter what.
'Okay then. See you Aoi and Amane.'
'See you.'
'See you.'
'Take care.'
'Goodbye.'
'Take care of Hat. Call me anytime.'
Hibari's car drove away.
It got quiet all of a sudden.
'What are you going to do, Amane? Don't you have\nto go back home?'
'Um... I'm staying here. I have to do more work\nif I go home.'
*hug*
'Waa!'
She hugged me suddenly.
'If it's only you and me, I can hug you as much\nas I want.'
'Like this...'
*hug hug*
'Mm... feels good.'
'...It's not just the two of us. Kanako is here.'
So is Hat.
'I forgot about that...'
She said, like she didn't really mean it and kept\nhugging me.
I complained but I couldn't do anything.
'Hehe... Aoi you really like breasts don't you.'
She said as she pushed them into me.
'...no sexual things okay?'
'Okay.'
She hugs me like she is happy all the way down to\nher heart.
'Thank you , Aoi.'
'Huh?'
'I can still dream thanks to you.'
What is she talking about? Is it about the test\nflight?
'...Okay,'
I said, and hugged her back.
Does she want to meet the person who used to be\nher best friend?
And Isuka...
I was thinking about the letter from Isuka that I\nfound yesterday and could feel Amane's warm,\nradiant happiness.
Am I still alive there?
The letter started like that...
...that was yesterday.
'Whoa!'
Kotori broke a floorboard with her wheelchair.
'Oh gosh! The floor is cracked.'
'...Habane, did you gain weight again?'
'N, no! It's not me! This floor might be rotten\nor something... I didn't get fat!'
'Oh, that's no good. The floor really is rotten.'
'What do you mean 'no good'? Help me here!'
I took the rotten wood and picked her up from the\ncrack.
'Hm?'
'What's up?'
'What is this?'
There is a tin can under the floor.
'Is that a cookie can?'
'Looks like it.'
'Oh, I've got it! It must me somebody's hidden\nmoney stash. It's buried treasure!'
It looks like somebody hid it, so that's\npossible.
'Let's open it.'
The rusty top opened with a thump.
In the box, there is a fancy letter, a panda doll\nand this...
'Glasses case?'
It's a very weird combination.
'What's going on?'
Amane came by.
'We found this under the floor.'
I showed her the inside of the box.
And then...
'Hm? This is my glasses case.'
'What? This is yours?'
'I lost it a long time ago. I guess it was here.'
'This isn't the kind of situation where you say\n'Oh! I guess it was here!' like that.
She didn't put this in here though.
'What is this panda doll?'
A panda doll.
It's one of those stuffed animals you can get\nfrom an arcade machine.
'...This is Isuka's favorite doll. It brings back\na lot of memories.'
'This is Isuka's?'
In that case, this letter is...
'Let's open it.'
'Can we...?'
'If she didn't want anybody to see, she shouldn't\nhave left it here.'
I was very curious too. So I opened it.
There were folded notes inside the envelope.
'What does it say?'
'Am I still alive there?'
That was written on one of the notes.
This handwriting is the same as what's in that\ndiary.
'What is it? What does it mean?'
Kotori and I looked at Amane, but she was just\nlooking at the letter and didn't say a word.
'There is one more.'
This one was more like a normal letter.
'Hey, Amane. Are you there?'
'How do you feel about wearing contact lenses?\nYou must be famous now, huh?'
'Could it be that you have a boyfriend? Oh, I'm\njealous.'
'I want you to appreciate me.'
She held the glasses case she took from the box\ntightly, and probably without thinking.
'What's the year there? How old am I?'
'Did you make your dreams come true already?\nHow's your life? Are you a success?'
'...I see. My future is bright, isn't it!?'
'I thought so.'
'Is this a time capsule?'
'...I guess so.'
This is a letter to her future self.
And to the best friend who is still beside her.
'...Why did she hide this glasses case? She is so\nstrange.'
Kotori looks at Amane who seems uncomfortable.
'But it turned out well. Because you got a\nboyfriend.'
She looked at me then looked at glasses case.
'...It's true.'
'I didn't choose you based on whether or not you\nwear glasses though...'
I said it just in case.
And there is a postscript on the letter.
'PS. I put Panko in here too.'
'If I fawn over Panko too much, Hat will get\njealous and attack it.'
The letter ended like that.
'...Isuka is weird,'
Kotori said, earnestly.
'By the way, Isuka is...'
'Are you talking about Isuka Misagi?'
Yoru said, suddenly.
'Yes, we are.'
'Do you know her?'
'I've met her once. At my grandpa's party.'
'Oh yeah, I remember her!'
Asa claps her hands.
'There were only adults at the party. When we got\nbored, she came to us and played with us.'
'She was much older than us. But she was still\nlike a kid.'
'What kind of party was that? Why was Isuka\nthere?'
'They have a party with local celebrities once a\nyear.'
'The Misagi family is a very powerful family\naround there, like the Kazatos. I think they used\nto be at the head of Keifuu Academy.'
'That means Isuka is a celebrity.'
We were surprised because it came out the blue.
Amane looked surprised too.
I've wondered what she is like, but I never\nexpected her to be a celebrity.
'She was strange. And Isuka is not a common name,\nso that must have been her.'
'Is your grandfather still in contact with the\nMisagis?'
'Maybe.'
'If you ask him, might he be able to tell us\nwhere Isuka is?'
'I don't know'
'...But it's worth it to ask him.'
'Yeah.'
We stumbled onto a way to find Isuka unexpectedly\nand we were excited.
Amane was surprised at what was happening and was\nstaring at the letter.
'...That's all.'
'That's what happened.'
I told An-chan about the time capsule while\nfixing the winch.
Even if I get days off, Amane has work. So I\ndecided to do maintenance so we can fly as soon\nas everybody comes back.
I was worried about doing it by myself, so I\nasked An-chan to come since he wasn't busy.
'...That's just like Isuka,'
He murmured after he read the letter I brought.
'That written there... is that...'
I say, pointing the letter.
'Am I still alive there?'
I was curious, but I couldn't ask Amane.
An-chan looks at the words and is quiet for a\nwhile.
'...She never thought she would live real long.'
'Her health was not good, so she took days off\nfrom school often.'
'She looks like normal girl. But once she gets a\nfever, she has to stay in bed for a few days.'
'She was born like that though... she accepts her\nfate.'
'Accepts her fate...'
I might die soon.
So there are people who live prepared for that.
'That's why to me she looked like she lives\nfast.'
'She was the kind of person who has to live\nhappier, have more fun and just live more life in\neach moment than anyone else.'
'...She sounds strange.'
She put Amane's glasses case into the box because\nthey didn't look good on her.
To be honest, I like her wearing contacts better\nthan glasses.
'Now that you mention it, I guess she was\nstrange...'
'She can't get along with people because she\nlives differently from others.'
'When she got isolated, she found someone else\nwho also couldn't get along with others.'
'Is that Amane?'
An-chan nods.
That was around the time she was being called a\ngenius and a goddess by those around her.
Everything was in order, but nothing was fun. The\nworld was gray.
'They had different reasons to be isolated. But\nthey were both alone so they could get along\ntogether.'
'Amane was glad that Isuka called her an idiot.'
'Ha ha ha. That's just like her. The only person\nwho can call Amane an idiot is Isuka.'
'What was Isuka like?'
'Well, if I were to describe her in one word? She\nwas an idiot.'
'She was... an idiot?'
'In good a way!'

'Amane is clever. So much so that people call her
a genius. She knows what she can do and what she
can't. That's why she doesn't waste her time and
she's never satisfied, even when she's
successful.'
'It's nothing special to her. She probably\ndoesn't even realize she's like that.'
For Amane, success and failure are already\naccounted for. It is enough to make her life\nboring.
'Isuka is the opposite. She doesn't know what she\ncan and can't do.'
'She learns from results.'
'...I see.'
In this world, people call that kind of person an\nidiot.
But for some reason, Isuka has me intrigued.
Maybe because An-chan and Amane talk about her so\nhappily.
'But things are not just about success or\nfailure. Things which are not either ones have\nvalue sometimes too.'
'Flying a glider is one of those, isn't it?'
I nod.
Gliders without motors depend on the wind to fly.\nThey can't carry passengers or parcels.
If it flies, it doesn't mean anything special.
That's just... what it's supposed to do.
'Isuka was looking for values like that, that you\ncan't see with the eye.'
'...Amane said the same thing.'
'The things which are right or wrong. Good things\nand bad things... Useful things and useless\nthings...'
'I used to see things like that. But Isuka showed\nme that there is more to the world.'
'In fact, most of things in the world are not\nlike that.'
'After I began to think like Isuka, my world\nstarted shining.'
'Isuka gave my world color.'
'...She said it like that.'
'Isuka influenced Amane a lot.'
'I guess so. But it's the same for Isuka.'
'Before she met Amane, she was bored. Everything\nshe did was wrong and nobody shared joy in\nanything with her.'
'She tried to hide herself. She was having a hard\ntime.'
'But Amane accepted Isuka the way she is.'
'What she does and how she talks... everything.'
'Everything...'
As far as I had heard and from what I read in the\nletter, she seemed to do a lot of stupid stuff.
But Amane accepted all of it.
'Amane always says that, doesn't she? That Isuka\nwas a genius.'
'Amane used to be treated special by the teachers\nand all of the students.'
'But she called Isuka a genius.'
'...If that were me, I would have been afraid. I\nwould have asked her to stop it.'
'Me too.'
'But Isuka was happy. She was like, 'Finally,\nI've met a person who understands my value!' and\nhad this smug face.'
'...She really was strange.'
She got carried away easily, just like Kotori.
'Isuka tried to hide her poor health from Amane.'
'How come?'
'She didn't want to show weakness to Amane. She\nwanted to be equal.'
'She found out soon though,'
An-chan said quietly and smiled.
I noticed something looking at his sad face.
The story he told now was full of sad memories\nfor him too.
But still I asked him a lot of questions.
'By the way, you and Amane opened up to each\nother. I can't believe Amane told you about\nIsuka.'
'What? Well... yes.'
She never went out of her way to talk about those\nthings before.
It was hard for her to face it.
'I haven't told you yet. But Amane and I... are\ndating.'
An-chan looked surprised for a moment but smiled\nhappily.
Wack!
'Ouch!'
'Good job, Aoi! I can't believe she is in love.'
'Ouch... really?'
'She has always been popular with the guys. I\nmean, I can understand because of how she looks.'
'But she didn't care about any guys.'
'She wasn't interested in dating at all.'
'Uh-huh.'
She didn't know about dating until recently.
'But you changed her...'
An-chan nodded and patted me on the head.
'H, hey, An-chan!?'
'Aha ha ha. Congratulations, Aoi! I can count on\nyou to take care of Amane.'
'An-chan... were you by chance...'
'What?'
'...Were you in love with Amane?'
He is staring at me, having blurted out what I\nwas thinking.
Then,
'I was in love with Isuka.'
'Isuka... I see.'
'That's why... that's why you knew so much about\nher even before Amane met her.'
If I think hard about it, it seems strange.
An-chan joined the Soaring Club after Isuka and\nthe others revived the club.
'Yeah.'
'But at that time, Isuka was into Amane. There\nwas no space for me.'
An-chan scratches his nose bashfully.
'...Do you still love her?'
An-chan shut his mouth and looked up at a sky\nthat was clear all the way up to the lake.
'...Yes, I do.'
In so few words, it was as if he'd said so much.
'Fortunately... we might be able to find out\nwhere she is now.'
'Are you sure?'
'...Asa and Yoru have seen her. They said she is\nthe daughter of a rich family.'
'Are you talking about Isuka?'
He looks surprised. It seems unexpected.
She might have hidden the fact she was rich so\nAn-chan didn't know.
'We may be able to contact her.'
An-chan's gaze fell upon the old winch.
'Amane and I feel like time has stopped since\nIsuka left.'
'We've been waiting for an opportunity to get it\nmoving again.'
'...If you were to fly the Morning Glory, we\nthought that could be our chance.'
'It doesn't matter if it moves for me or not,\nwhat does matter is that it moves for Amane.'
'Yeah...'
I was thinking the same thing, albeit vaguely.
If not, her promise with Isuka will stay in her\nmind forever.
'If I find anything out, I'll let you know as\nsoon as possible.'
'Yes, please.'
'Alright then...'
An-chan tapped my arm gently.
'Take good care of Amane.'
I nodded, looking at his eyes.
'La-la-laaa'
I was humming while I cooked.
In the pot carrots, potatoes, onions and hearty\nmeat are boiling.
'You sound happy.'
'Oh yeah?'
'I've never seen you hum.'
That's right. I don't usually hum.
'It's fun to cook if I think someone will enjoy\nmy food.'
'Are you talking about me?'
'...Yeah, well... you too.'
In our dormitory, everybody enjoys the meal I\ncook.
But my girlfriend is the best because she eats\nwith reckless abandon.
'(My girlfriend...) Heh heh heh'
It makes me smile.
It seems more real to me after I told An-chan.
'How about Mochizuki?'
'We are doing well.'
'Where do you guys go on dates? I bet it's\nWindy's.'
'Dates? We haven't gone on one yet.'
We haven't had a date yet because the club is\nvery busy.
'Are you sure? Are you guys even dating?'
'O...of course.'
'But you haven't had a date yet.'
'We've been busy.'
'We're off from clubs. Why don't you go\nsomewhere?'
'...That's right. I should.'
While we were talking about that,
'I'm home.'
She came back.
'Hi, Amane.'
'Hi.'
'Smells good. Are we having curry tonight?'
'Yes, your favorite, beef curry.'
Amane's tastes are like that of a kid.
She likes hamburg steak, curry and spaghetti.\nSimple stuff.
'(If I make a lot all at once, we can eat it for\na while. )'
There are only 3 people in the dormitory now.
Nobody minds if we have curry every day.
'After I boil it for a few minutes, it's going to\nbe ready. Go change your clothes and wash your\nhands.'
'Yay! Cu-rryCu-rry'
Amane, delighted like a child, makes me smile.
My girlfriend is very cute.
'Thank you for dinner!'
Amane ate all her curry and put her hands\ntogether in front of the empty plate.
'That was delicious.'
The beef curry, which stewed a long time, was\ngood.
'It will be better tomorrow.'
'Aw... that makes me hungry again.'
'Thanks for the curry.'
Kanako brought the plate to the sink and left the\ndining room.
On the way,
'(Good luck, Aoi.)'
She mouthed that to me.
'(You can count on me!)'
I replied, winking. Then she went to her room.
'Ummmm...'
Amane looks serious and is groaning in her chair.
'What's wrong?'
'...I'm your girlfriend, aren't I?'
'Y, yes.'
If she asks me like that, I lose confidence.
'You do so much for me and I don't do anything\nfor you.'
'I'm worried that it's not okay. In my own way,\nI'm really worried.'
Then she moans again.
I guess she really liked the curry that I made\ntoday.
'You give me things.'
'Hm? What?'
'You're happy to eat the meals that I make. And\nyou appreciate me for cooking. Those things make\nme very happy.'
'Really? You are strange.'
She takes pity on me.
'Don't look at me like that! Like I take pleasure\nin weird stuff...'
'Do you want me to smile or something? Do you\nhave any requests on how I can thank you?'
'Well... yeah, but please do it naturally.'
If it's not natural, it'll make me unhappy.
'Well... if you'd give me compliments, I guess\nthat would be nice.'
After I said that, I was embarrassed.
But it'll make me happier to get compliments from\nher than from anyone else.
'Compliments...'
She said and put her hand on my head.
Then she patted my head.
'You did very well, Aoi.'
'...(blushes)'
'W, well, this is very embarrassing. Ha ha ha.'
'He he he... You are so cute, Aoi.'
I don't think 'cute' is a good word for men, but\nit still makes me happy that she says that. Maybe\nit's because she is much older than me.
I leaned on her like a cat bathing in the sun.
'He he he'
'(Oops. It feels so good so I almost forgot\nsomething important.)'
'A, Amane, do you have any plans for tomorrow?'
'Nothing special. Just the same as usual,'
She answered, stroking my head.
That means she has work.
To her it is unthinkable to take two days off per\nweek.
If she doen't have anything special to do, she\nstays in her room and works.
'Why don't we go out?'
I asked her with my heart pounding.
'Alright, but where?'
I remembered the place in Kazegaura that Kanako\ntold me about.
To tell the truth, I already checked the place\nout while I was cooking.
'How about movies? There are some interesting\nmovies playing now.'
'Movies, huh...'
'Aren't you interested in them?'
'Yea. not interested.'
She says it so plainly.
'Then want to go look at the clothes? They're\ndoing a discount at Windys right now!'
'I have enough clothes.'
'O, ok. How about bowling?'
'If you want to, that'll be fine.'
I'm not especially interested in bowling.
She's not interested in anything that young girls\nlike to do on dates.
'...Do you have anywhere you want to go?'
'Well...'
She was thinking, putting her finger on her lips.
That is very cute.
'...I want to go swimming.'
'In the pool?'
It was in the list that Kanako gave me. Swimming\nis advanced stuff for a date.
Usually, people don't go to the pool because they\nhave to wear bathing suits.
'No.'
'We went there together, didn't we? The beach at\nthe lake.'
'Ah, there.'
'I want to go there again. It was fun.'
Her smile was very cute and she said it so\nhappily that we decided to go there the very next\nday.
'We are off to the beach.'
'Please take care of the dorm and Hat.'
'Okay. Have fun.'
'Quack, quack.'
Just like last year, the beach is very quiet.\nIt's a well-kept secret that not many know about.
'We should have brought Hat.'
'It wouldn't be a date if he were here.'
I said it strongly because it's so important to\nme.
'...Oh! It's a date!'
She said it like she had no idea why we were\nhere.
But really, she just figured it out.
'...What did you think it was?'
'I thought we just came to swim in the lake.'
'Couples go out together. That is a date.'
'Okay. I got it.'
She learned something else.
'Alright. Do you want to change clothes? Are you\nalready wearing your bathing suit?'
'No.'
'Ok. So go change behind the rock. I'll make sure\nnobody's around.'
'I'll be embarrassed if you watch.'
'I'm not going to watch you change!'
'Oh, okay.'
She grabbed her bag and went behind the rock.
I don't think anyone will come by because it's a\nvery quiet place, but I'm looking out just in\ncase.
I waited for a while.
'I'm done.'
She came back.
'What's wrong?'
I looked away because Amane in a bathing suit\nunder the white summer sun was too hot for me.
'(She's got great proportions.)'
Even though when I hug her, she's so soft and\nplump, yet she's not fat at all.
Instead the breast have got excessive volume.
'Aoi you're not getting changed?'
'Eh? Um yes, I'll get changed.'
I already had them underneath, so I took off my\nshirt and pants and I was instantly in my\nswimmers.
'Then let's swim!'
'Alright!'
We ran like kids into the water.
'It's nice and cool. Feels good.'
'Hey.'
'Whoa.'
Amane was playing in the shallow water. She was\nsurprised that she was splashed with water.
'You!'
'Ah!'
She splashes me too.
'Hey!'
'Aha ha ha... Hey now.'
We splashed each other for a while.
I've seen couples play in the water in movies.\nBut I never thought people actually do it.
I guess there are people like that.
